Traits.Name: Ethereal
Traits.Description: Flying, phasing, and has evasion unless adjacent to a foe.

Traits.Name: Pure Void
Traits.Description: When a Hollow Demon is defeated, it is destroyed, creating a void rift in its space, which counts as a pit to all characters but demons. At the end of each round, summon a Natal in an adjacent space to the void rift. The rift can be targeted, has 10 hp, and is automatically hit by attacks.
